blogPost.excerpt: Getting the perfect name for your startup is obviously important. In fact, it's the first thing people notice when visiting our brand. But... it's a pain to find a great name/domain that's available. Now, it's time to forget that pain because we're here to help you.
blogPost.body: Getting the perfect name for your startup is obviously important. In fact, it's the first thing people notice when visiting our brand. But... it's a pain to find a great name/domain that's available. Now, it's time to forget that pain because we're here to help you.
blogPost.title: The Netly Domains - Business domain names for startups and entrepreneurs
blogPost.author: Dinakar Sakthivel

localize.description: 为你的创业公司取一个完美的名字显然很重要。事实上，这是人们在访问我们的品牌时首先注意到的事情。但是......要找到一个可用的好名字/域名是一件很痛苦的事情。现在，是时候忘记这种痛苦了，因为我们是来帮助你的。
localize.tagline: 创业公司和企业家的商业域名

localize.description: 爲你的創業公司取一個完美的名字顯然很重要。事實上，這是人們在訪問我們的品牌時首先注意到的事情。但是......要找到一個可用的好名字/域名是一件很痛苦的事情。現在，是時候忘記這種痛苦了，因爲我們是來幫助你的。
localize.tagline: 創業公司和企業家的商業域名

previous.excerpt: Vtiger Cloud CRM now has a Forever Free edition for all those who sign up in 2021. Pilot Edition is a part of the Vtiger Re: boot program, and this is built to help companies to accelerate their growth and recovery coming out of the pandemic.
previous.title: Vtiger Pilot - Free CRM software built for companies getting started

localize.description: Vtiger云CRM现在有一个永远免费版，凡是在2021年注册的用户都可以使用。试用版是Vtiger Re。引导计划，这是建立在帮助企业加快发展和恢复走出大流行。
localize.tagline: 免费的CRM软件，为企业的起步打造

localize.description: Vtiger雲CRM現在有一個永遠免費版，凡是在2021年註冊的用戶都可以使用。試用版是Vtiger Re。引導計劃，這是建立在幫助企業加快發展和恢復走出大流行。
localize.tagline: 免費的CRM軟件，爲企業的起步打造
